General.Name: M Split Corp
General.Description: M Split Corp. is a close-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Quadravest Capital Management Inc. It invests in the public equity markets of Canada. The fund invests in the stocks of companies engaged in the financial sector. It invests its entire corpus in the stock of Manulife Financial Corp. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the S&P TSX Financial index. M Split Corp. was formed on February 12, 2007 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1K7
